name: Interactive DVD Screensaver Emulator
description:
DVD Screensaver Emulator has interactive features, allowing the user to push the DVD logo around with their mouse. Sound effects are included, and there's a reward for hitting the logo into the corner. In addition, whenever the logo hits the cursor or the edge of the screen, it will change color.

The current version has some bugs and lacks features that I want to implement in the future, so keep an eye out for updates.
